data.title: bd-1lpe.5: Implement COMMIT phase: atomic ref updates
data.description: Implemented COMMIT phase scaffold in src/merge/commit.rs: CAS advance of refs/manifold/epoch/current then refs/heads/main, merge-state persistence to .manifold/merge-state with atomic rename+fsync, and recovery helper for crash-after-first-ref. Added 3 targeted tests (commit happy path + recovery cases). risk:high â€” failure-mode checklist required.
